remarks: Relationship between group division and group multiplication. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jul-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
grpdivf.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
grpdivf.3 $e |- D = ( /g ` G ) $.
grpodiveq $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A D B ) = C <-> ( C G B ) = A ) ) $.
